Notification of Network Security Responsibilities for Internet Information Service Institutions

Last updated: March 2017

Dear users!

We have recently received notice about the record in the public station issued by the public security department. You are requested to log in to the National Public Security for Internet Sites Security Services Platform as soon as possible, and submit an application for public security recording. If the formalities are not handled for more than 30 days after the date the network is officially connected, the connection will be suspended in accordance with the laws. The contents of the notice are as follows:

In order to protect the security of network information, guarantee the legitimate rights and interests of citizens, legal persons and other organizations, and safeguard national security and public interests, in accordance with the regulations of applicable laws and rules, like the Regulations of the People's Republic of China for Computer Information Systems Security Protection and Computer Information Network International Network Security Protection Management Measures. The network security responsibilities that your institution shall fulfill according to law are given below:

I. Possess related qualifications that are required by the laws and regulations;

The providers for Internet information services shall be the entities that solely bear the legal responsibilities. Related licenses and qualifications shall be obtained for engaging in the Internet information services which require approval of the relevant departments, in accordance with laws and regulations and related decisions of the State Council.

II. Accept the supervision, inspection and guidance of public security organizations according to laws;

III. Assist public security organizations in investigating and punishing illegal criminal activities concerned with the Internet in accordance with laws;

IV. Be in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and standards for security management, such as the Regulations of the People's Republic of China for Computer Information Systems Security Protections, Computer Information Network International Network Security Protection Management Measures, Provisions on Technical Measures for the Protection of Internet Security, Security Protection Requirements for Internet Interactive Services, and Basic Procedures and Requirements for Internet Service Security Evaluation, and perform other security protection obligations, for instance, filtration of illegal information, inspection of public information and users’ qualifications, retention of log information, rapid disposal, and implement safety management responsibilities and related technical measures for security protection;

V. Post a record icon issued by public security organizations in a prominent position on the home page of the website;

VI. When the record information of the website changes, you are requested to log in to the platform to submit the changed information within 30 days since the information was changed. If you fail to go through the formalities in line with the regulated requirements and time limits, the public security organization will notify the access provider to suspend website access according to laws;

VII. When the website is no longer opened, you are requested to log in to the National Public Security for Internet Sites Security Services Platform within 5 working days and submit a cancellation application to the network security department of the local public security organization.

No fees are charged for filing with public security. In case of any problems related to records in the public security organization, you can consult the local network police department, or visit the National Public Security for Internet Sites Security Services Platform for more details.

21Vianet’s Microsoft Azure Team on April 21, 2016
